===== General How To =====

0. You need a single channel mic and a camera hooked up to your computer.
1. Inside the livestream folder, run the livestream.exe file.
2. Select your mic from the list shown.
3. If you'd like to hear the audio playback, pick yes (it will pick your default output device).
4. The processes will load up and recording will start automatically.
5. Video is not recorded (for now, working on it).
6. To stop recording, press [SHIFT+ESC]
7. To save, follow screen prompts.

This will only work on Windows
